å°†æ£‹ãƒ‘ã‚ºãƒ«ã¨ã¯

ã€€æ•°å¹´å‰ã«Twitterã§å¥³æµæ£‹å£«ã®ä¸­å€‰å½°å­ã•ã‚“ã®å‘Ÿãã‚’è¦‹ã¦ãã®å­˜åœ¨ã‚’çŸ¥ã‚Šã¾ã—ãŸã€æœ€è¿‘æ›¸ç±ã‚’å‡ºã•ã‚ŒãŸã‚ˆã†ã§ã™ã€‚å­ä¾›ã®é ƒï¼”Ã—ï¼”ã®ï¼‘ï¼–ãƒã‚¹ã®ã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã«ï¼‘ã€œï¼‘ï¼•ã¾ã§ã®æ•°å­—ãŒæ›¸ã‹ã‚ŒãŸãƒãƒ©ãƒãƒ©ã®ãƒ”ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã‚’æ•°å­—ã®é †ã«ä¸¦ã¹ç›´ã™ã¨ã„ã†ãƒ‘ã‚ºãƒ«ã‚’ã‚„ã£ãŸã“ã¨ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ãŒã€ãã‚Œã®å°†æ£‹ç‰ˆã¨æ€ãˆã°ã„ã„ã¨æ€ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚ä½†ã—ç›¤é¢ã¯ï¼“Ã—ï¼“ã§å…ˆæ‰‹ç•ªã®é§’ã ã‘ã‚’è‡ªç”±ã«é…ç½®ã—ã€ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ¼ãƒˆã®å±€é¢ã‹ã‚‰å°†æ£‹ã®é§’ã‚’å‹•ã‹ã—ã¦ã‚´ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã®å±€é¢ã«å¤‰åŒ–ã•ã›ã‚‹ã¨ã„ã†ã‚‚ã®ã§ã€ã¾ãšå°†æ£‹ã®é§’ã®å‹•ãã‚’è¦šãˆãªã„ã¨å‡ºæ¥ã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚ãƒ‘ã‚ºãƒ«ã®å­˜åœ¨ã‚’çŸ¥ã£ãŸæ™‚ã¯è§£ç­”ã‚’å¾—ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã®ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚°ãƒ©ãƒ ã‚’ä½œã‚ã†ãªã‚“ã¦æ€ã„ã¾ã›ã‚“ã§ã—ãŸãŒã€ï¼“ä¸‰å°†æ£‹ã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒªã‚’ä½œã£ãŸç›´å¾Œãªã®ã§ã€ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚°ãƒ©ãƒ ã«å¿…è¦ãªéƒ¨å“ãŒå…¨ã¦æƒã£ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã®ã§ä½œã£ã¦ã¿ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚

å¿…è¦ãªä½œæ¥­

  1. é§’ã®å‹•ãã‚’å®šç¾©ã—ãŸPieceã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¹ï¼ˆä½œæˆæ¸ˆã¿ï¼‰
  2. é§’ã®åˆ¶å¾¡ã‚’è¡Œã†Boardã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¹ï¼ˆä½œæˆæ¸ˆã¿ï¼‰
  3. ç›¤é¢ã‚’å¤šåˆ†æœ¨ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã¨ã—ã¦æ ¼ç´ã™ã‚‹Nodeã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¹ï¼ˆä»Šå›ä½œæˆï¼‰
  4. BFSï¼ˆå¹…å„ªå…ˆæ¢ç´¢ï¼‰ã§å­˜åœ¨ã—å¾—ã‚‹å…¨ã¦ã®ç›¤é¢ã‚’ç”Ÿæˆã—ã¦Nodeã‚ªãƒ–ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆã«è¿½åŠ 

ã€€ï¼‘ï¼•ãƒ”ãƒ¼ã‚¹ãƒ‘ã‚ºãƒ«ã‚„è¿·è·¯ã‚’è§£ãæ™‚ãªã‚“ã‹ã¯ï¼‘ã€ï¼’ã¯ä¸è¦ãªã®ã§ç°¡å˜ã§ã™ãŒã€å°†æ£‹ãƒ‘ã‚ºãƒ«è§£ç­”ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚°ãƒ©ãƒ ã‚’ä¸€ã‹ã‚‰ä½œã‚‹ã¨ãªã‚‹ã¨çµæ§‹å¤§å¤‰ã§ã™ã€‚ã§ã‚‚ä»Šå›ã¯å‰å›ã®è¨˜äº‹ã§ä½¿ç”¨ã—ãŸã‚½ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã‚’è‹¥å¹²ä¿®æ­£ã—ã¦ãã®ã¾ã¾åˆ©ç”¨å‡ºæ¥ã¾ã™ã€‚

Nodeã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¹

class Node
    _counter = 0
    _duplication = []

    # åŒã˜é§’ãŒè¤‡æ•°ä½¿ç”¨ã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚‚ã‚ã‚‹ã®ã§åº§æ¨™ã‚‚å«ã‚ã¦ã‚½ãƒ¼ãƒˆ
    _sortCoordinate = (a, b) ->
        kinds = ["Ou", "Hi", "Ka", "Ki", "Gi", "Ke", "Ky", "Fu"]
        return kinds.indexOf(a["kind"]) - kinds.indexOf(b["kind"]) || a["posi0"] - b["posi0"] || a["posi1"] - b["posi1"]

    # å±€é¢ã‚’æ¯”è¼ƒã™ã‚‹ãŸã‚Hashã‚’ç”Ÿæˆ
    @make_hash = (board) ->
        rec = []
        for koma in board.pieces
            buf = {}
            buf["kind"] = koma.kind()
            buf["turn"] = koma.turn
            buf["status"] = koma.status
            buf["posi0"] = koma.posi[0]
            buf["posi1"] = koma.posi[1]
            rec.push(buf)
        rec.sort _sortCoordinate
        return crypto.createHash('md5').update(JSON.stringify(rec)).digest("hex")

    # é‡è¤‡å±€é¢ã‚’ãƒã‚§ãƒƒã‚¯ã™ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã«å±€é¢ã®Hashå€¤ã‚’è¿½åŠ 
    @set_dup = (hash) ->
        _duplication.push(hash)

    # å‡ºç¾æ¸ˆã¿ã®å±€é¢ãªã‚‰trueã€æ–°è¦å±€é¢ãªã‚‰falseã‚’è¿”ã™
    @check_dup = (hash) ->
        check = (v for v in _duplication when v == hash)
        if check.length > 0
            return true
        else
            return false

    # Boardã‚ªãƒ–ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆã¨ãã®å­å±€é¢ã‚’æ ¼ç´ã™ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã®é…åˆ—ã‚’ç”¨æ„
    constructor: (v) ->
        @value = v
        @child = []

    # ç­”ãˆã®å±€é¢ã‚’æ¢ã—ã¦è¦‹ã¤ã‘ãŸã‚‰æ‰‹æ•°ã¨å±€é¢ã‚’è¡¨ç¤º
    search: (target) ->
        return null unless target?
        return @ if Node.make_hash(@value) == Node.make_hash(target)
        ret = false
        for v in @child
            # ç­”ãˆã®å±€é¢ã‚’è¦‹ã¤ã‘ãŸ
            if Node.make_hash(v.value) == Node.make_hash(target)
                ret = true
                _counter += 1
                console.log("#{_counter}:")
                v.value.display()
            else
                ret = v.search(target)
                # ç­”ãˆã‚’è¦‹ã¤ã‘ãŸå¾Œã¯ã€ãã®éç¨‹ã®å±€é¢ã¨æ‰‹æ•°ã‚’é¡ã£ã¦è¡¨ç¤º
                if ret
                    _counter += 1
                    console.log("#{_counter}:")
                    v.value.display()
            break if ret
        return ret

    # å­å±€é¢ã‚’è¾¿ã‚ŠãªãŒã‚‰å¤šåˆ†æœ¨ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚’è¿½åŠ ã—ã¦ã„ã
    add: (target, obj) ->
        ret = null
        for v, i in @child
            # è¦ªã¨ãªã‚‹å±€é¢ã‚’è¦‹ã¤ã‘ãŸã‚‰ãã®å­å±€é¢ã¨ã—ã¦Nodeã‚ªãƒ–ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆã‚’è¿½åŠ 
            if Node.make_hash(v.value) == Node.make_hash(target)
                ret = v.child.push(obj)
            # è¦‹ã¤ã‹ã‚‰ãªã‘ã‚Œã°ã•ã‚‰ã«å­å±€é¢ã‚’è¾¿ã‚‹
            else
                ret = v.add(target, obj)
            break if ret?
        return ret

å®Ÿè¡Œãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«

# game.coffee
startTime = new Date().getTime()

bfs = (board) ->
    queue = []
    queue.push(board)
    seq = 0
    layer = 0
    while queue.length > 0
        bd = queue.shift()
        layer += 1
        for koma in bd.pieces
            for v in eval("Piece." + koma.kind()).getD(koma.turn, koma.status)
                buf = [].concat(koma.posi)
                loop
                    break unless ((buf[0] + v.xd in [1..bd.cols]) && (buf[1] + v.yd in [1..bd.rows]))
                    buf[0] += v.xd; buf[1] += v.yd
                    dest = (o for o in bd.pieces when o.posi? && o.posi[0] == buf[0] && o.posi[1] == buf[1])
                    break if dest.length != 0 && dest[0].turn == koma.turn
                    if bd.check_move(koma, buf)
                        # ç€æ‰‹å¯èƒ½ãªæ‰‹ãªã‚‰Boardã‚ªãƒ–ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆã‚’ãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ¼ãƒ—ã‚³ãƒ”ãƒ¼ï¼ˆæ–°ãŸãªå±€é¢ã‚’ç”Ÿæˆï¼‰
                        temp = bd.clone()
                        move_piece = (o for o in temp.pieces when o.posi? && o.posi[0] == koma.posi[0] && o.posi[1] == koma.posi[1])
                        temp.move_capture(move_piece[0], buf)
                        md5hash = Node.make_hash(temp)
                        # temp.display()
                        # é‡è¤‡å±€é¢ã¯å¤šåˆ†æœ¨ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã«è¿½åŠ ã—ãªã„
                        if Node.check_dup(md5hash)
                            continue
                        else
                            Node.set_dup(md5hash)
                        seq += 1
                        if layer == 1
                            node.child.push(new Node(temp))
                        else
                            node.add(bd, new Node(temp))
                        queue.push(temp)
                        # console.log("seq = #{seq}")
                    break unless (dest.length == 0 && v.series)

# ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ¼ãƒˆå±€é¢
b = new Board()
b.pieces = []
b.pieces.push(new Piece.Ka(Const.FIRST, Const.Status.OMOTE, [3,1]))
b.pieces.push(new Piece.Gi(Const.FIRST, Const.Status.OMOTE, [2,2]))
b.pieces.push(new Piece.Fu(Const.FIRST, Const.Status.OMOTE, [3,3]))
b.pieces.push(new Piece.Fu(Const.FIRST, Const.Status.OMOTE, [2,1]))
b.pieces.push(new Piece.Fu(Const.FIRST, Const.Status.OMOTE, [1,3]))

# ã‚´ãƒ¼ãƒ«ï¼ˆç­”ãˆï¼‰ã®å±€é¢
answer = new Board()
answer.pieces.push(new Piece.Ka(Const.FIRST, Const.Status.OMOTE, [1,3]))
answer.pieces.push(new Piece.Gi(Const.FIRST, Const.Status.OMOTE, [2,2]))
answer.pieces.push(new Piece.Fu(Const.FIRST, Const.Status.OMOTE, [3,3]))
answer.pieces.push(new Piece.Fu(Const.FIRST, Const.Status.OMOTE, [2,1]))
answer.pieces.push(new Piece.Fu(Const.FIRST, Const.Status.OMOTE, [1,1]))

node = new Node(b)
bfs(b)
node.search(answer)

        xhr = new XMLHttpRequest
        fileReader = new FileReader
        xhr.open 'GET', './XXXX.json', true
        xhr.responseType = 'json'
        xhr.addEventListener 'load', (=>
            if (xhr.status == 200)
            # if xhr.readyState == 4 and xhr.status == 0
                buf = xhr.response
                compressed = LZString.compressToUTF16(JSON.stringify(buf))
                try
                    localStorage.setItem 'SerializedData', compressed
                catch e
                    console.log 'Storage failed: ' + e
            return
        ), false
        xhr.send()

<!DOCTYPE HTML>
<html lang="ja">
<head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">

    <script src="js/tweenjs-0.6.2.min.js"></script>
    <script>
      //ã“ã“ã«ä»¥ä¸‹ã®JavaScriptã‚’ã‚³ãƒ”ãƒš
    </script>
    <title>ã‚¹ãƒ—ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒˆã‚·ãƒ¼ãƒˆãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆï¼ˆTictactoe Evoï¼‰</title>

  • ä½¿ç”¨ã—ãŸã‚¹ã‚¯ãƒªãƒ—ãƒˆ
    <script>
    var stage, imgData, frame, filename;
    function setImageData(idx) {
        switch (idx) {
        case 0:
            frame = [1, 1, 767, 714];
            filename = "./images/test.png";
            break;
        case 1:
            frame = [1, 717, 382, 336];
            filename = "./images/test.png";
            break;
        default:
            frame = [1, 1, 767, 714];
            filename = "./images/test.png";
            break;
        }
    };
    function handleImageLoad() {
        var data = {
            images: [imgData],
            frames: [
	            frame
            ]
        }
        var orgX = document.getElementById("canvasImage").clientWidth;
        var orgY = document.getElementById("canvasImage").clientHeight;
        var limitX = orgX / frame[2];
        var limitY = orgY / frame[3];
        var spriteSheet = new createjs.SpriteSheet(data);

        var sprite = new createjs.Sprite(spriteSheet, 0);
        sprite.x = 0;  sprite.y = 0; sprite.scaleX = 0; sprite.scaleY = 0;
        stage.addChild(sprite);

        createjs.Ticker.setFPS(60);
        createjs.Ticker.addEventListener('tick', tickHandler);

        createjs.Tween.get(sprite).to({alpha: 1, scaleX: limitX, scaleY: limitY}, 2000);
    };

    function tickHandler(event) {
        stage.update();
    };

    function init() {
        var imgIndex = Math.floor(Math.random() * 2) + 1;
        stage = new createjs.Stage('canvasImage');
        stage.clear();
        imgData = new Image();
        imgData.onload = handleImageLoad;
        setImageData(imgIndex);
        imgData.src = filename;
    };

    </script>

$ ->
    new Sample

class Sample
    constructor: ->
        @status = null
        @trees = null
        @progressBar = document.getElementById("progressbar")
        @startbtn = document.getElementById("btnStart")
        @spanCount = document.getElementById("spanCount")
        @statusarea = document.getElementById("spanStatus")
        @labelprogress = document.getElementById("trees")
        $('#btnStart').on 'click', (e) =>
            target = $(e.currentTarget)
            @btnstart(target)

    btnstart: (target) ->
        @trees = new Array()
        @heavy()
        @statusarea.innerHTML = @trees.length.toString()

    heavy: ->
        seq = 0
        while seq < 6046
            seq += 1
            @trees.push(seq)
            bar = (seq / 6046) * 100
            console.log(@trees.length.toString())
            @spanCount.innerHTML = Math.floor(bar) if bar?
  • é€²æ—çŠ¶æ³ã‚’ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚°ãƒ¬ã‚¹ãƒãƒ¼ã«è¡¨ç¤ºã—ãªãŒã‚‰å‡¦ç†ã™ã‚‹ã‚µãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ«
$ ->
    new Sample

class Sample
    constructor: ->
        @status = null
        @trees = null
        @progressBar = document.getElementById("progressbar")
        @startbtn = document.getElementById("btnStart")
        @spanCount = document.getElementById("spanCount")
        @statusarea = document.getElementById("spanStatus")
        @labelprogress = document.getElementById("trees")
        $('#btnStart').on 'click', (e) =>
            target = $(e.currentTarget)
            @btnstart(target)

    btnstart: (target) ->
        @labelprogress.style.display = "block"
        @heavy(0)

    heavy: (seq) ->
        if seq == 0
            @trees = new Array()
        if seq < 6046
            seq += 1
            @trees.push(seq)
            bar = (seq / 6046) * 100
            setTimeout (=>
                @heavy(seq)
            ), 0
        else
            bar = 100
            @labelprogress.style.display = "none"
        console.log(@trees.length.toString())
        @statusarea.innerHTML = @trees.length.toString()
        @progressBar.value = Math.floor(bar) if bar?
        @spanCount.innerHTML = Math.floor(bar) if bar?

ã€€ä»¥å‰ã‹ã‚‰è¨˜äº‹ã«æ›¸ã„ã¦ã„ãŸRubyã§ä½œã£ãŸä¸‰ç›®ä¸¦ã¹ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚°ãƒ©ãƒ ã‚’CoffeeScript(JavaScript)ã«ç§»æ¤ã—ã‚ˆã†ã¨æ€ã£ã¦ã‚·ãƒªã‚¢ãƒ©ã‚¤ã‚ºã®å¿…è¦ã«é§†ã‚‰ã‚ŒãŸã®ã§ã™ãŒã€å¼·åŒ–å­¦ç¿’å¾Œã®ä¸‰ç›®ä¸¦ã¹ã®å…¨å±€é¢åˆ†ã®å¤šåˆ†æœ¨ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚’ã‚·ãƒªã‚¢ãƒ©ã‚¤ã‚ºã—ã¦ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã«ä¿å­˜ã—ã€æ¬¡å›å†é–‹ã™ã‚‹ã¨ãã¯ãã®å­¦ç¿’çµæœãŒåæ˜ ã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’èª­ã¿è¾¼ã¿ãƒ‡ã‚·ãƒªã‚¢ãƒ©ã‚¤ã‚ºã—ã¦å¯¾æˆ¦ã‚’é–‹å§‹ã§ãã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã«ã—ãŸã„ã‚ã‘ã§ã™ã€‚Rubyãªã‚‰ä»¥ä¸‹ã®ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã§ç°¡å˜ã«å®Ÿç¾å‡ºæ¥ãŸã“ã¨ã§ã™ã€‚

class Tree
  def self.read(path)
    begin
      Pathname.new(path).open("rb") do |f|
        trees = Marshal.load(f)
      end
    rescue
      p $!
    end
  end

  def self.save(path, obj)
    begin
      Pathname.new(path).open("wb") do |f|
        Marshal.dump(obj, f)
      end
    rescue
      p $!
    end
  end

ã€€å­¦ç¿’ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚’ä¿æŒã—ãŸã‚ªãƒ–ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆã‚’Marshal.dumpã§ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã«ä¿å­˜ã—ã€ãã‚Œã‚’Marshal.loadã™ã‚‹ã ã‘ã§ã€å¾©å…ƒã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‹ã‚‰èª­ã¿è¾¼ã¾ã‚ŒãŸã‚ªãƒ–ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆã¯newã—ã¦ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚’ç”Ÿæˆã—ãŸã‚ªãƒ–ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆã¨å¤‰ã‚ã‚Šãªãæ©Ÿèƒ½ã—ã€Treeã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¹ã«ç”¨æ„ã—ã¦ã‚ã‚‹ãƒ¡ã‚½ãƒƒãƒ‰ã‚‚å‘¼ã³å‡ºã›ã¾ã™ã€‚å‘¼ã³å‡ºã—å´ã®ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã¯ä»¥ä¸‹ã®ãŸã£ãŸï¼’è¡Œã§ã™ã€‚

#ä¿å­˜ã™ã‚‹ã¨ã
Tree::save("./trees.dump", @trees)

#èª­ã¿è¾¼ã‚€ã¨ã
@trees = Tree::read("./trees.dump")

ã€€ã§ã‚‚JavaScriptã ã¨JSON.stringifyã§ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚’ä¿å­˜ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã¯å‡ºæ¥ã¦ã‚‚ãƒ¡ã‚½ãƒƒãƒ‰ã®æƒ…å ±ãŒä¿å­˜ã•ã‚Œãªã„ã®ã§ã€å¾©å…ƒã™ã‚‹ã¨ãã«ã¯ã€ã‚ªãƒ–ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆãŒä¿æŒã—ã¦ã„ãŸãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚’ä½¿ã£ã¦ã‚ã‚‰ãŸã‚ã¦ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚’ç”Ÿæˆã™ã‚‹å¿…è¦ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚Treeã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¹ã¯ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒã‚¸ãƒƒãƒˆãƒ‘ã‚¿ãƒ¼ãƒ³ã«ãªã£ã¦ã„ã¦ã€ä¸€ã¤ã®å±€é¢ã‚’ä¿æŒã™ã‚‹Treeã‚ªãƒ–ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆãŒå…¥ã‚Œå­çŠ¶ã«ãªã£ã¦ã€æåˆ†ã‹ã‚Œã™ã‚‹å±€é¢ã‚’ä¿æŒã™ã‚‹å½¢ã«ãªã£ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã®ã§ã™ãŒã€ã‚ªãƒ–ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆãŒå†…åŒ…ã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã‚ªãƒ–ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆã‚‚åŒæ§˜ã«ã‚ã‚‰ãŸã‚ã¦ç”Ÿæˆã—ãªã‘ã‚Œã°ãªã‚‰ãªã„ã®ã§ã€å…¨å±€é¢åˆ†ã®ç›¤é¢ã‚ªãƒ–ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆï¼ˆBoardã‚ªãƒ–ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆï¼‰ã‚’å…¨éƒ¨ new ã—ã¦ã„ãå¿…è¦ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚

class Tree
    @deserialize: (src) ->
        buf = new Tree(new Board())
        @build(buf, src)
        return buf
    #ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‹ã‚‰èª­ã¿å–ã£ãŸãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã§åˆæœŸåŒ–ã—ãªãŒã‚‰ã€å†å¸°é–¢æ•°ã‚’ä½¿ã£ã¦å¤šåˆ†æœ¨ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚’å†å½¢æˆã—ã¦ã„ã
    @build: (root, src) ->
        for c in src.child
            newroot = new Tree(new Board(c.value), c.score)
            root.child.push(newroot)
            @build(newroot, c)

  def idx(score)
    ret = nil
    index = rand(score.inject{|sum, n| sum + n})
    start = 0
    score.each_with_index{|v, i|
      start += v
      if start > index
        ret = i
        break
      end
    }
    return ret
  end

class Tree
  attr_reader :value, :child, :score
  def initialize(v, c=[])
    @value = v
    @child = c
    @score = v.clone
    @score.map!{|v|
      unless v
        v = 10
      else
        v = 0
      end
    }
  end

  #ä¸€ã¤ç›®ã®ãƒ‘ãƒ©ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã§æŒ‡å®šã•ã‚ŒãŸå±€é¢ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ï¼ˆè¦ªï¼‰ã‚’æ¢ã—ã¦ã€ãã®å­ãƒãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã¨ã—ã¦ã‚ªãƒ–ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆã‚’è¿½åŠ ã™ã‚‹
  def add(target, obj)
    ret = nil
    @child.each_with_index { |c, i|
      if c.value == target
        ret = c.child.push(obj)
      else
        ret = c.add(target, obj)
      end
      break if ret
    }
    return ret
  end
  #æŒ‡å®šã•ã‚ŒãŸå±€é¢ã®ãƒãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚’è¿”ã™
  def search(v)
    ret = nil
    @child.each { |c|
      if c.value == v
        ret = c.value
      else
        ret = c.search(v)
      end
      break if ret
    }
    return ret
  end
  #å‹•ä½œç¢ºèªç”¨
  def parent(v)
    ret = nil
    @child.each { |c|
      if c.value == v
        ret = @value
      else
        ret = c.parent(v)
      end
      break if ret
    }
    return ret
  end

end

ã€€ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚’æ“ä½œã™ã‚‹ã®ã¯å¸¸ã«æœ¨æ§‹é€ ã®æ ¹ï¼ˆãƒ«ãƒ¼ãƒˆ,rootï¼‰ã‹ã‚‰å†å¸°é–¢æ•°ã‚’å‘¼ã³å‡ºã™å½¢ã«ãªã‚‹ã®ã§ç‰¹å¾´çš„ã§ã‚·ãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ«ãªã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã«ãªã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚ä»Šå›ã¯scoreã¨ã„ã†ç‰¹æ®Šãªè¦ç´ ã‚‚ä»˜åŠ ã—ãŸã®ã§ã“ã®Treeã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¹ã¯æ±ç”¨çš„ãªã‚‚ã®ã§ã¯ãªããªã£ã¦ã¾ã™ãŒã€ä½¿ç”¨ã™ã‚‹ãƒ¡ã‚½ãƒƒãƒ‰ã¯å¤šåˆ†æœ¨ã‚’ä½¿ã†æ™‚ã¯å¸¸ã«ä¼¼ãŸã‚ˆã†ãªæ„Ÿã˜ï¼ˆå†å¸°é–¢æ•°ã°ã‹ã‚Šï¼‰ã«ãªã‚‹ã‚“ã˜ã‚ƒç„¡ã„ã§ã—ã‚‡ã†ã‹ã€‚

ã„ã„åŠ æ¸›ãªæ•°å€¤æ¤œè¨¼

ã€€æ‰‹å§‹ã‚ã«å‰å›ã®è¨˜äº‹ã§ä½œæˆã—ãŸbfsãƒ¡ã‚½ãƒƒãƒ‰ã¨ä¸Šè¨˜Treeã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¹ã‚’ä½¿ã£ã¦ä¸‰ç›®ä¸¦ã¹ã®å±€é¢ãŒã©ã‚Œã»ã©ã®æ•°ã«ãªã‚‹ã®ã‹æ•°ãˆã‚ˆã†ã¨æ€ã„é‡è¤‡ãƒã‚§ãƒƒã‚¯ï¼ˆcheck_dupãƒ¡ã‚½ãƒƒãƒ‰ï¼‰ã‚’å¤–ã—ã¦è©¦ã—ã¦ã¿ãŸã¨ã“ã‚ã€ã„ã¤ã¾ã§çµŒã£ã¦ã‚‚å‡¦ç†ãŒçµ‚ã‚ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚

    board = Board.new([nil, nil, nil, nil, nil, nil, nil, nil, nil])
    trees = Tree.new(board)
    while queue != [] do
      buf = queue.shift
      layer = 9 - buf.select{|b| !b}.size
      buf.each_with_index {|b, i|
        next if b
        temp = buf.clone
        temp[i] = buf.teban
#        next if check_dup(temp)
        case layer
        when 0
          trees.child.push(Tree.new(temp))
        else
          trees.add(buf, Tree.new(temp))
        end
        temp.teban = (buf.teban == CROSS) ? NOUGHT : CROSS
        set_dup(temp); queue.push(temp)

  def bfs(board, turn)
    init_dup
    queue = Array.new
    board.teban = turn
    set_dup(board); queue.push(board)

    locate = nil
    while queue != [] do
      buf = queue.shift
      #ã‚­ãƒ¥ãƒ¼ã‹ã‚‰ä¸€å±€é¢ã‚’å–ã‚Šå‡ºã—ã¦ä¸€æ‰‹ãšã¤æ‰“ã¤
      buf.each_with_index {|b, i|
        #æ—¢ã«é§’ãŒã‚ã‚Œã°æ¬¡ã®å ´æ‰€ã¸
        next if b
        temp = buf.clone
        temp[i] = buf.teban
        #åŒä¸€å±€é¢ãŒã‚ã‚Œã°æ¬¡ã®å±€é¢ã¸
        next if check_dup(temp)

        ??????
        set_dup(temp); queue.push(temp)
      }
    end

ã€€APIãŒå…¬é–‹ã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ãŸã®ã§å°‘ã—è§¦ã£ã¦ã¿ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚Withings API Quickstart Guideã¨éŠ˜æ‰“ã£ãŸã‚µã‚¤ãƒˆã®é€šã‚Šwithingsç”¨ã®gemã‚’ä½¿ãˆã°ã™ãã«è‡ªåˆ†ãŒç™»éŒ²ã—ãŸãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚’å–å¾—ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒå‡ºæ¥ã¾ã—ãŸãŒã€æœ€æ–°ã®APIã«å¯¾å¿œã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã‹åˆ†ã‹ã‚‰ãªã‹ã£ãŸã—ä½¿ã„æ–¹ã‚‚ã‚ˆãã‚ã‹ã‚‰ãªã„ã—ã€ã‚¢ã‚¯ã‚»ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ¼ã‚¯ãƒ³ã‚’å–å¾—ã—ãŸå¾Œã¯Withingsã®APIãƒ‰ã‚­ãƒ¥ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒˆã‚’è¦‹ãªãŒã‚‰è‡ªåˆ†ã§ãƒ‘ãƒ©ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚’ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆã—ã¦ã„ã‚ã‚“ãªãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã®å–å¾—ã‚’è©¦ã—ã¦ã¿ãŸã‹ã£ãŸã®ã§ã€ç‰¹åˆ¥ãªgemã‚’ä½¿ç”¨ã›ãšã«jsonãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚’å–å¾—ã™ã‚‹ã‚¹ã‚¯ãƒªãƒ—ãƒˆã‚’æ›¸ã„ã¦ã¿ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚
ã€€ã“ã®ã‚¹ã‚¯ãƒªãƒ—ãƒˆã‚’å®Ÿè¡Œã™ã‚‹ã«ã¯Twitterã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒªã‚’ä½œã‚‹æ™‚ãªã‚“ã‹ã¨åŒæ§˜ã«Withingsã«ã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒªã‚’ç™»éŒ²ã—ã¦API Keyã€API Secretã‚’å–å¾—ã™ã‚‹å¿…è¦ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚ãã—ã¦Withings API ã®ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã®FIRST STEPã«å¾“ã£ã¦æ“ä½œã—ã€OAuthèªè¨¼å®Œäº†å¾Œuseridã€oauth_tokenã€oauth_token_secretã®å€¤ã‚’å–å¾—ã—ã¦ã‚¹ã‚¯ãƒªãƒ—ãƒˆã«ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆã—ã¦ãŠãå¿…è¦ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚

#sleep.rb
require 'pp'
require 'openssl'
require 'time'
require 'json'
require 'net/http'
require 'cgi'
require 'base64'

BASE_URI='https://wbsapi.withings.net'
WITHINGS_OAUTH_CONSUMER_KEY='xxxxx'
WITHINGS_OAUTH_CONSUMER_SECRET='yyyyy'

user_id = 1234567
oauth_token = "aiueo"
oauth_token_secret = "iroha"

params = {:action => :get, :userid => 1234567}
#params = {:action => :getworkouts, :userid => 1234567}
#params = {:action => :getsummary, :userid => 1234567}
#params = {:action => :getactivity, :userid => 1234567}
#params = {:action => :getbyuserid, :userid => 1234567}

url = BASE_URI + '/v2/sleep'
#url = BASE_URI + '/v2/measure'
#url = BASE_URI + '/user'
#url = BASE_URI + '/v2/user'

params.merge!({
                :oauth_consumer_key => WITHINGS_OAUTH_CONSUMER_KEY,
                :startdate => Time.parse("2015-08-07 12:00:00").to_i,
                :enddate => Time.parse("2015-08-08 12:00:00").to_i,
#                :startdateymd => '2015-08-09',
#                :enddateymd => '2015-08-09',
#                :startdateymd => Time.parse("2015-08-03 12:00:00").to_i,
#                :enddateymd => Time.parse("2015-08-09 12:00:00").to_i,
#                :lastupdate => Time.parse("2015-08-08 12:00:00").to_i,
                :oauth_nonce => rand(10 ** 30).to_s(16),
                :oauth_signature_method => 'HMAC-SHA1',
                :oauth_timestamp => Time.now.to_i,
                :oauth_version => '1.0',
                :oauth_token => oauth_token
              })
params = params.to_a.map() do |item|
  [item.first.to_s, CGI.escape(item.last.to_s)]
end.sort
param_string = params.map() {|key, value| "#{key}=#{value}"}.join('&')
base_string = ['GET', CGI.escape(url), CGI.escape(param_string)].join('&')
secret = [WITHINGS_OAUTH_CONSUMER_SECRET, oauth_token_secret].join('&')
digest = OpenSSL::HMAC.digest('sha1', secret, base_string)
signature = Base64.encode64(digest).chomp.gsub( /\n/, '' )
uri_string = url + '?' + param_string + '&oauth_signature=' + CGI.escape(signature)
#p uri_string

Net::HTTP.version_1_2
uri = URI.parse(uri_string)
json = Net::HTTP.get(uri)
result = JSON.parse(json)
pp result

// lib/MongoBuilder.js
var mongo = require('mongodb');

module.exports.ready = function(db_name, callback){
  if ( process.env.MONGOLAB_URI ){
    mongo.connect(process.env.MONGOLAB_URI, {}, function(err, db){
      callback(db);
    });
  }else{
    new mongo.Db('tictactoe', new mongo.Server('localhost', 27017), {safe: false}).open(function(err,db){
      callback(db);
    });
  }
};

ã€€ä»¥ä¸‹ã®ã‚ˆã†ã«ä½¿ç”¨ã™ã‚Œã°ã€

// routes/index.js
var MB = require("../lib/MongoBuilder");
var users = new Array();
exports.mypage = function(req, res){
  MB.ready('tictactoe', function(db){
    var collection = db.collection("tictactoe");
    collection.find().sort({score: -1}).limit(100).toArray(function(err, users){
      res.render('index', {title: 'Tictactoe Unbeaten', users: users});
    });
  });
}

ã€€HTML5ã§ã‚¢ãƒ‹ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã‚’å®Ÿç¾ã™ã‚‹æ–¹æ³•ã‚’èª¿ã¹ã¦ã¿ãŸã‚‰ã€ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒãƒ¼ã‚’ä½¿ã†å¿…è¦ãŒç„¡ããªã£ãŸã‚‰ã—ã„ï¼ˆã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒãƒ¼é–“éš”ã‚’ãƒ–ãƒ©ã‚¦ã‚¶ä»»ã›ã«å‡ºæ¥ã‚‹ï¼‰ã®ã§ã‚„ã£ã¦ã¿ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚ãã‚Œãã‚Œã®ãƒ–ãƒ©ã‚¦ã‚¶ç”¨ã«APIãŒåˆ†ã‹ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã§ä»Šå¾Œã©ã†ãªã‚‹ã‹ã‚ã‹ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“ï¼ˆHTML5è‡ªä½“ãŒã¾ã ã¾ã æµå‹•çš„ã ã¨æ€ã„ã¾ã™ãŒï¼‰ãŒã€çµæ§‹ä»¥å‰ï¼ˆHTML5ãƒªãƒªãƒ¼ã‚¹å½“åˆï¼‰ã‹ã‚‰ã“ã®ã‚„ã‚Šæ–¹ã¯å®šç€ã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã‚‰ã—ã„ã§ã™ã€‚æ‰‹å…ƒã®Android4.1.2ã®ç«¯æœ«ï¼ˆGL07Sï¼‰ã§ã‚‚å•é¡Œãªãå‹•ãã¾ã—ãŸã€‚IEã§HTML5ã‚’åˆ©ç”¨ã™ã‚‹ã«ã¯IE9ä»¥ä¸ŠãŒå¿…è¦ã§ã™ã€‚

äºŒç‚¹ã®åº§æ¨™ã‚’ã‚¯ãƒªãƒƒã‚¯ã—ã¦ç›´ç·šã‚’å¼•ãã‚µãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ«

ã€€è¦ã™ã‚‹ã«RequestAnimationFrameã¨ã„ã†APIã‚’ä½¿ãˆã°ã„ã„ã¨ã„ã†è©±ãªã®ã§ã™ãŒãƒãƒƒãƒˆã§androidã®å¯¾å¿œçŠ¶æ³ã¯4.1ä»¥ä¸Šã§ã‚‚å…¨æ»…ã¨ã„ã†æ›¸ãè¾¼ã¿ã‚’ã¡ã‚‰ã»ã‚‰è¦‹ã‹ã‘ã¾ã™ã€‚ã§ã‚‚ã€å®Ÿéš›ã«ã‚„ã£ã¦ã¿ã‚‹ã¨ä»¥ä¸‹ã®CoffeeScriptã‚’ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ‘ã‚¤ãƒ«ã—ãŸanimation.jsã¨animation.htmlã‚’androidç«¯æœ«ï¼ˆGL07sï¼‰ã«ã‚³ãƒ”ãƒ¼ã—ã¦URLæŒ‡å®šã™ã‚Œã°æ¨™æº–ãƒ–ãƒ©ã‚¦ã‚¶ã§ãµã¤ã†ã«å‹•ä½œã—ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚ãƒãƒƒãƒˆã§ã¯jQueryã¨ã„ã£ã—ã‚‡ã«ä½¿ç”¨ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã§å•é¡ŒãŒå‡ºã‚‹ã¨ã„ã†æ›¸ãè¾¼ã¿ã‚‚è¦‹ã‹ã‘ã¾ã—ãŸãŒç„¡è¦–ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã«ã—ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚çŸ¥ã‚‰ãªã„ã†ã¡ã«è§£æ±ºã•ã‚ŒãŸã®ã§ã—ã‚‡ã†1:grin:
ã€€å®Ÿéš›ã«ã‚¢ãƒ‹ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã‚’é§†ä½¿ã™ã‚‹ã‚¹ãƒãƒ›ã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒªã‚’ä½œã‚‹ã¨ãã¯ã€æ—¢å­˜ã®ã„ã‚ã‚“ãªãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒ–ãƒ©ãƒªã‚’ä½¿ã†ã“ã¨ãŒå¤šã„ã®ã‹ã‚‚ã—ã‚Œã¾ã›ã‚“ãŒHTML5ã ã‘ã§å‡ºæ¥ã‚‹ã»ã†ãŒã‚·ãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ«ã§ã„ã„ã§ã™ã­ã€‚

#animation.coffee
$ ->

    return new Animation()
    
class Animation
    constructor: ->
        @canvas = document.getElementById("canvasMain")
        @areaStartX = document.getElementById("spanStartX")
        @areaStartY = document.getElementById("spanStartY")
        @areaEndX = document.getElementById("spanEndX")
        @areaEndY = document.getElementById("spanEndY")
        @start = {x:0, y:0}
        @end = {x:100, y:100}
        @request = null
        @amount = 0
        @startflg = true
        @setEventListener()
        @touch(@start.x, @start.y)
        @touch(@end.x, @end.y)

    touch: (clientX, clientY) =>
        if @startflg
            @startflg = false
            @start.x = clientX; @areaStartX.innerHTML = clientX
            @start.y = clientY; @areaStartY.innerHTML = clientY
        else
            @startflg = true
            @end.x = clientX; @areaEndX.innerHTML = clientX
            @end.y = clientY; @areaEndY.innerHTML = clientY
        
    setEventListener: =>
        $('#canvasMain').on 'click', (e) =>
            @touch(e.clientX, e.clientY)

        $('#btnStart').on 'click', (e) =>
            @animate()
        
    animate: =>
        @request = requestAnimFrame(@animate, @canvas)
        @drawanimation()

    drawanimation: =>
        @context = @canvas.getContext('2d')
        @context.clearRect(0, 0, @canvas.width, @canvas.height)
        @amount += 0.02
        @amount = 1 if @amount > 1
        @context.beginPath()
        @context.moveTo @start.x, @start.y
        @context.strokeStyle = 'rgba(255, 105, 180, 0.7)'
        @context.lineWidth = 12
        newX = @start.x + (@end.x - @start.x) * @amount
        newY = @start.y + (@end.y - @start.y) * @amount
        @context.lineTo newX, newY
        @context.stroke()
        if newX is @end.x and newY is @end.y
            cancelRequestAnimFrame @request
            @request = null
            @amount = 0

window.Animation = window.Animation || Animation

window.requestAnimFrame = (->
  window.requestAnimationFrame or window.webkitRequestAnimationFrame or window.mozRequestAnimationFrame or window.oRequestAnimationFrame or window.msRequestAnimationFrame or (callback, element) ->
    window.setTimeout callback, 1000 / 60
)()
window.cancelRequestAnimFrame = (->
  window.cancelAnimationFrame or window.webkitCancelRequestAnimationFrame or window.mozCancelRequestAnimationFrame or window.oCancelRequestAnimationFrame or window.msCancelRequestAnimationFrame or clearTimeout
)()

</head>
<body>
<div>

    <form>
      <p>
      é–‹å§‹ç‚¹ã€€X=<span id="spanStartX"></span>:
      Y=<span id="spanStartY"></span><br />
      çµ‚äº†ç‚¹ã€€X=<span id="spanEndX"></span>:
      Y=<span id="spanEndY"></span>
      </p>
      <p>
        <input id="btnStart" type="button" value="æç”»">
      </p>
    </form>
</div>

</body>

#app/views/memos/_form.html.erb
 <%= form_for(@memo, remote: true) do |f| %>
   <div class="field">
     <%= f.label :body %><br>
     <%= f.text_field :body %>
   </div>
   <div class="field">
     <%= f.label :chk %><br>
     <%= f.check_box :chk %>
   </div>
   <div class="actions">
     <%= f.submit %>
   </div>
   <div id="status"></div>
 <% end %>

#app/controllers/memos_controller.rb
  def update
    if @memo.update(memo_params)
      @status = "O.K."
    else
      @status = "N.G."
    end
    render
  end

#app/views/memos/update.js.erb

#app/views/memos/_form.html.erb
<%= javascript_tag do %>
jQuery(function ($){
    $("#memo_chk").on('change', function(){
        body = $("#memo_body").val();
        authenticity_token = $("#authenticity_token").val();
        $.ajax({
            url: '<%= memo_path(id: @memo.id, format: :js) %>',
            type: 'PATCH',
            dataType: 'html',
            data: {
                id: '<%= @memo.id %>',
                authenticity_token: authenticity_token,
                memo: {
                    body: body,
                    chk: (this.checked) ? 't' : 'f'
                    }
            }
        }).done(function(data, status, xhr) {
            $('#status').html(data);
        }).fail(function(xhr, status, error) {
            alert('Error Occured(' + error + ')');
        });
     });
});
<% end %>

<%= form_for(@memo, remote: true, html:{name: "frm_chkbox"}) do |f| %>
  <%= hidden_field_tag(:authenticity_token, form_authenticity_token) %>
  <div class="field">
    <%= f.label :body %><br>
    <%= f.text_field :body %>
  </div>
  <div class="field">
    <%= f.label :chk %><br>
    <%= f.check_box(:chk) %>
  </div>
  <div class="actions">
    <%= f.submit %>
  </div>

  <div id="status"></div>
<% end %>

#app/assets/javascripts/memos.js.coffee
jQuery ($) ->
    $("#memo_chk").on "change", ->
        id = $("#memo_id").val()
        body = $("#memo_body").val()
        chk = $(this).is(":checked") ? "t" : "f"
        authenticity_token = $("#authenticity_token").val()
        $.ajax(
            url: "/memos/" + id + ".js"
            type: "PATCH"
            dataType: "text"
            data:
                id: id
                authenticity_token: authenticity_token
                memo:
                    body: body
                    chk: (if chk then "t" else "f")
        ).done((data, status, xhr) ->
            $("#status").html data
            return
        ).fail (xhr, status, error) ->
            alert "Error Occured(" + error + ")"
            return

        return

    return

#app/controllers/memos_controller.rb
  def update
    if @memo.update(memo_params)
      @status = "O.K."
    else
      @status = "N.G."
    end
    if request.method == "PATCH"
      render :text => @status
    else
      render template: "memos/update.js.erb"
    end
  end

      respond_to do |format|

  #éå»ã«åŒä¸€å±€é¢ãŒã‚ã£ãŸã‹ã©ã†ã‹åˆ¤å®š
  def check_dup(sengo)
    temp = self.dup
    temp.unshift(sengo)
    return @duplication.has_key?(temp.hash)
  end
  #å±€é¢ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã®ãƒãƒƒã‚·ãƒ¥å€¤ã ã‘ä¿å­˜
  def set_dup(sengo)
    temp = self.dup
    temp.unshift(sengo)
    @duplication[(temp).hash] = temp
  end

ã€€ä¸Šè¨˜ã®ã‚ˆã†ã«ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚°ãƒ©ãƒ ä¸­ã®æåˆˆã‚Šéƒ¨åˆ†ã®ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ï¼’è¡Œã‚’ã‚³ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒˆã«ã—ã¦ã€ä¸Šè¨˜ã®ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆçµæœã¨åŒã˜çµæœãŒå¾—ã‚‰ã‚Œã¾ã—ãŸã®ã§æåˆˆã‚Šã‚‚æ­£å¸¸ã«æ©Ÿèƒ½ã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã§ã™ã€‚ã¡ãªã¿ã«è©•ä¾¡é–¢æ•°ãŒå‘¼ã³å‡ºã•ã‚Œã‚‹å›æ•°ã‚’æ•°ãˆã¦è¦‹ãŸã¨ã“ã‚ã€ã™ã¹ã¦ã®æ‰‹ã‚’èª­ã¿åˆ‡ã‚‹ã¾ã§ã«MIN-MAXæ³•ã§ã¯255,168å›ã€Î±Î²æ³•ã§ã¯100,645å›ã§ã—ãŸã€‚

ã¡ã‚‡ã£ã¨å¤‰ã‚ã£ãŸä¸‰ç›®ä¸¦ã¹

ã€€Twitterä½¿ã£ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã¨ã€Œã¡ã‚‡ã£ã¨å¤‰ã‚ã£ãŸä¸‰ç›®ä¸¦ã¹ Arrange Lineã€ã¨ã„ã†ã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒªã‚’è¦‹ã‹ã‘ãŸã®ã§ãƒ«ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã‚’ç¢ºèªã—ã¦ã¿ã‚‹ã¨ã€ãªã‚“ã¨ä»Šå¼„ã£ã¦ã„ã‚‹ä¸‰ç›®ä¸¦ã¹ã‚’ã»ã¨ã‚“ã©ãã®ã¾ã¾æµç”¨å‡ºæ¥ãã†ã˜ã‚ƒãªã„ã§ã™ã‹ï¼Ÿãªã‚“ã‹ç¥æ§˜ã‹ã‚‰ä½¿å‘½ã‚’æˆã‹ã£ãŸã‚ˆã†ãªæ°—ã«ãªã£ãŸã®ã§ä½œã£ã¦è¦‹ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚

#Board.initializeã«è¿½åŠ 
    @c_q = Array.new
    @c_bk = Array.new
    @n_q = Array.new
    @n_bk = Array.new
#Board.initã«è¿½åŠ     
    @c_q.clear
    @c_bk.clear
    @n_q.clear
    @n_bk.clear
#Boardã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¹ã«è¿½åŠ 
  def set(i, v)
    if self[i]
      raise "Error!"
    else
      self[i] = v
    end
    if v == CROSS
      @c_q << i
      if @c_q.size > 3
        idx = @c_q.shift
        @c_bk.push([idx, self[idx]])
        self[idx] = nil
      end
    elsif v == NOUGHT
      @n_q << i
      if @n_q.size > 3
        idx = @n_q.shift
        @n_bk.push([idx, self[idx]])
        self[idx] = nil
      end
    end
  end

  def unset(v)
    if v == CROSS
      if @c_bk.size > 0
        h = Hash[*(@c_bk.pop)]
        temp = h.each{|k, v| self[k] = v}
        @c_q.unshift(temp.keys[0])
      end
      idx = @c_q.pop
    elsif v == NOUGHT
      if @n_bk.size > 0
        h = Hash[*(@n_bk.pop)]
        temp = h.each{|k, v| self[k] = v}
        @n_q.unshift(temp.keys[0])
      end
      idx = @n_q.pop
    end
    self[idx] = nil
  end

ã€€Rubyç”¨ã®GUIé–‹ç™ºãƒ„ãƒ¼ãƒ«Shoesã‚’ä½¿ã£ã¦ä¸€é€šã‚Šæ©Ÿèƒ½ã‚’å‚™ãˆãŸå°†æ£‹ã‚½ãƒ•ãƒˆã‚’ä½œã£ã¦ã¿ãŸã®ã§ã™ãŒã€æ€ã£ã¦ã„ãŸä»¥ä¸Šã«å¼±ã„ã€‚å¤§æ˜”ã«ã‚ªã‚»ãƒ­ã®ã‚½ãƒ•ãƒˆã‚’ä½œã£ãŸã“ã¨ãŒã‚ã‚‹ã®ã§ã™ãŒã€min-maxæ³•ã¨Î±Î²æ³•ã‚’ä½¿ãˆã°æ™®é€šã®äººã§ã¯å‹ã¦ãªã„ãã‚‰ã„ã®ã‚‚ã®ãŒç°¡å˜ã«ä½œã‚Œã¾ã—ãŸã€‚ã‚ªã‚»ãƒ­ã§ã¯å››éš…ã‚’å–ã‚‹ã¨æœ‰åˆ©ã«ãªã‚‹ã®ã§ã€éš…ã®ã‚³ãƒã¯ç‚¹æ•°ã‚’é«˜ãã—ã¦ã€ãã®éš£ã®ä½ç½®ã¯ç‚¹æ•°ã‚’ä½ãã™ã‚‹ã¨ã„ã†ã€ã‚³ãƒã‚’ç½®ãç›¤é¢ã®ä½ç½®ã«é‡ã¿ä»˜ã‘ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã§å±€é¢ã‚’è©•ä¾¡ã™ã‚‹ã‚ˆãã‚ã‚‹è©•ä¾¡é–¢æ•°ã‚’ä½¿ãˆã°ååˆ†ã§ã—ãŸã€‚
ã€€ã ã‹ã‚‰å°†æ£‹ã®å ´åˆã‚‚ãã‚Œãã‚Œã®é§’ã«é‡ã¿ä»˜ã‘ã‚’ã—ã¦è©•ä¾¡é–¢æ•°ã‚’ä½œã‚Œã°ã€ã‚ªã‚»ãƒ­ã«æ¯”ã¹ã‚‹ã¨èª­ã‚€å±€é¢ã®æ•°ãŒå¤šããªã‚‹ã¨ã¯ã„ãˆã€ãã‚Œãªã‚Šã«å¼·ã„ã‚‚ã®ãŒå‡ºæ¥ã‚‹ã¨æ€ã£ã¦ã„ãŸã®ã«ã‚ã¾ã‚Šã«ã‚‚å¼±ã‹ã£ãŸã®ã§ã™ã€‚ãã“ã§è©•ä¾¡é–¢æ•°ã¯ç½®ã„ã¨ã„ã¦å±€é¢ã®å…ˆèª­ã¿éƒ¨åˆ†ãŒã†ã¾ãã„ã£ã¦ã‚‹ã®ã‹ç¢ºèªã™ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã«ã€ã¾ãšã¯ã‚ˆã‚Šå˜ç´”ãªã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ ã§ã‚ã‚‹ä¸‰ç›®ä¸¦ã¹ã§ç¢ºèªã—ã‚ˆã†ã¨æ€ã£ãŸã®ãŒä½œæˆã®ãã£ã‹ã‘ã§ã™ã€‚ä¸‰ç›®ä¸¦ã¹ï¼ˆtictactoeï¼‰ãªã‚‰åˆæ‰‹ã‹ã‚‰ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ çµ‚äº†ã¾ã§èª­ã¿ãã‚Œã‚‹ã®ã§å…ˆèª­ã¿é–¢æ•°ã«å•é¡ŒãŒãªã„ã‹ã©ã†ã‹åˆ¤æ–­ã—ã‚„ã™ã„ã¨æ€ã£ãŸã‹ã‚‰ã§ã™ã€‚

min-maxæ³•

  #å…ˆæ‰‹Ã—ã¯æœ€å¤§å€¤ã€å¾Œæ‰‹â—‹ã¯æœ€å°å€¤ã‚’é¸æŠã™ã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã«å†å¸°ã—ãªãŒã‚‰å±€é¢ã‚’å…ˆèª­ã¿
  def lookahead(board, turn, cnt)
    if turn == CROSS
      value = MIN_VALUE
    else
      value = MAX_VALUE
    end
    locate = nil
    board.each_with_index {|b, i|
      next if b
      board[i] = turn
      temp_v = evaluation(board)
      teban = (turn == CROSS) ? NOUGHT : CROSS
      if (temp_v != MAX_VALUE && temp_v != MIN_VALUE && cnt < SIZE - 1)
        #æŒ‡å®šã—ãŸæ·±ã•ã¾ã§å†å¸°å‘¼å‡ºã—
        temp_v, temp_locate = lookahead(board, teban, cnt + 1)
      end
      board[i] = nil
      #å…ˆæ‰‹Ã—ã®ç•ªã¨å¾Œæ‰‹â—‹ã®ç•ªã§ã€åŒã˜æ·±ã•ã§ã®æœ€å°ã€æœ€å¤§ã®è©•ä¾¡å€¤ã‚’valueã«ä¿å­˜
      if (temp_v > value && turn == CROSS) || (temp_v < value && turn == NOUGHT)
        value = temp_v 
        locate = i
      end
    }
    #åŒã˜æ·±ã•ã§ã®æœ€å°ã€æœ€å¤§ã®è©•ä¾¡å€¤ã‚’è¿”ã™
    return value, locate
  end

Î±Î²æ³•

  1. min-maxæ³•ã«ã€è¦ªå±€é¢ã®è©•ä¾¡å€¤ã‚’å­å±€é¢ã«ä¼ãˆã‚‹ãŸã‚ã®å¼•æ•°ã‚’è¿½åŠ 
  2. å¼•æ•°ã§æ¸¡ã•ã‚ŒãŸè¦ªå±€é¢ã®è©•ä¾¡å€¤ã¨ç¾å±€é¢ã‚’æ¯”è¼ƒã—ã¦ã€ç¾å±€é¢ãŒé¸æŠã•ã‚Œã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒãªã„ã“ã¨ãŒã‚ã‹ã£ãŸã‚‰ã€å…ˆèª­ã¿ã‚’ä¸­æ–­ã—ã¦returnã™ã‚‹ï¼ˆÎ±ã‚«ãƒƒãƒˆã¨Î²ã‚«ãƒƒãƒˆï¼‰
  #ç¾å±€é¢ã®è©•ä¾¡å€¤ã‚’å­å±€é¢ã«æ¸¡ã—ãªãŒã‚‰å†å¸°é–¢æ•°ã§å±€é¢ã‚’å…ˆèª­ã¿
  def lookahead(board, turn, cnt, threshold)
    if turn == CROSS
      value = MIN_VALUE
    else
      value = MAX_VALUE
    end
    locate = nil
    board.each_with_index {|b, i|
      next if b
      board[i] = turn
      temp_v = evaluation(board)
      teban = (turn == CROSS) ? NOUGHT : CROSS
      if (temp_v != MAX_VALUE && temp_v != MIN_VALUE && cnt < SIZE - 1)
        temp_v, temp_locate = lookahead(board, teban, cnt + 1, temp_v)
      end
      board[i] = nil
      #å…ˆæ‰‹Ã—ã®ç•ª
      if (temp_v > value && turn == CROSS) 
        value = temp_v 
        locate = i
        #é–¾å€¤ã‚’ä¸Šå›ã£ãŸã‚‰å…ˆèª­ã¿ä¸­æ­¢
        return value, locate if threshold < temp_v
      #å¾Œæ‰‹â—‹ã®ç•ª
      elsif (temp_v < value && turn == NOUGHT)
        value = temp_v 
        locate = i
        #é–¾å€¤ã‚’ä¸‹å›ã£ãŸã‚‰å…ˆèª­ã¿ä¸­æ­¢
        return value, locate if threshold > temp_v
      end
    }
    #åŒã˜æ·±ã•ã§ã®æœ€å°ã€æœ€å¤§ã®è©•ä¾¡å€¤ã‚’è¿”ã™
    return value, locate
  end

end

#serverå´ã‚µãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ«  
require 'eventmachine'

class Serv < EM::Connection
  attr_accessor :track
  def post_init
    puts "myserv: init"
  end

  def receive_data(data)
    puts data
    send_data @track
    EM.stop if data =~ /stop/i
  end

  def connection_completed
    puts "myserv: completed"
  end

  def unbind
    puts "myserv: unbind"
  end
end

EM.run do
  EM.start_server("127.0.0.1", 10000, Serv) do |conn|
    conn.track = ARGV[0]
  end
end

#location_spec.rb
describe Location do
  describe "#initialize" do
    it "sets the latitude and longitude" do
      loc = Location.new(:latitude => 38.911268,
                         :longitude => -77.444243)
      loc.latitude.should == 38.911268
      loc.longitude.should == -77.444243
    end
  end
end
